titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat income from certain leases as income from rental real estate activities in which the taxpayer actively participates.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/25/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to limiting passive activity losses and credits for taxpayers in the real property business, to include as real estate activity the lease of real estate under a nonmaterial participation share lease. Defines such a lease.
